main.name: Max Smith
main.description: Welcome to my portfolio page!  Currently based in Denver, Colorado, USA, I hope to make a positive contribution to the industry of web development in the time to come.
main.bio: Hi, my name is Max Smith. I'm an aspiring front-end web developer. Scroll down to view some of my education background and tech skills. I like web development for its creative component and stuctural discpline.  I also enjoy learning more about HTML, CSS, JS, and their corresponding frameworks.
main.contactmessage: Feel free to contact me using the following form.

education.description: Building upon the above-mentioned curriculum, the workshops presented by the Digital Workshop Center, based in Fort Collins, Colorado, fostered a greater and more broad understanding of the tools used by front-end software engineers.  The courses included Javascript I/II, Photoshop I/II, SEO, Google Analytics, and Essential Web Tools. The certificate culminated with a mentored Capstone Project - this portfolio page!.

education.degree: Completed a semester course in HTML/CSS.
education.description: This course focused on the technical understanding of and skill in HTML5 and CSS3. The course was fourteen weeks time.  I felt good about this course - our professor was disciplined and genuinely wanted us to understand all things HTML and CSS. The course culminated with a final website project.

education.degree: B.S. in Biopsychology, Cognition, and Neuroscience (one degree)
education.description: Rigorous Major that required a high level of personal organization, time management, analytical thinking and reasoning, and knowledge of the scientific method.

work.title: Landscape Worker
work.description: We did spring clean up of leaves and sticks, edged garden beds in preparation for mulch, and mulched garden beds according to the customer's desires and needs.

work.title: Cashier and Store Support Associate
work.description: I worked the POS system for Whole Foods Market, ensuring customer satisfaction through a timely process, friendly demeanor, and ability to answer any questions or concerns they might have about the store and our products.

projects.title: Final Oakland Community College Project
projects.category: Called 'Stan's Exotic Island Getaways,' this is a mock business webiste created using HTML and CSS.

projects.title: A Poetry Pamphlet Website
projects.category: A site I made to publish poetry

testimonials.text: Mock testimonial (need to obtain some for this portfolio - or don't use this section at all): Max Smith is a hard worker and a reliable employee.  He is punctual, courteous, and is easy to work with. I believe him to be a deserving job candidate.
